notes: Phase 10 release APK complete. Release signing configured with environment variables for CI/CD support (VETTID_KEYSTORE_PATH, VETTID_KEYSTORE_PASSWORD, VETTID_KEY_ALIAS, VETTID_KEY_PASSWORD). Release keystore generated with 4096-bit RSA key, 10000 day validity. ProGuard rules updated to handle EdDSA/NATS sun.security.x509 dependency. R8 minification enabled with aggressive obfuscation, log stripping, and resource shrinking. Release APK (27MB) signed with APK Signature Scheme v2. GitHub Release v1.0.0-phase10 created with release notes and APK download.
